title: 22 of 2015)) of the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 (No. 5 of 2000), and by

text_raw:
2. 

It is hereby declared that the national minimum hourly rate of pay for the 
purposes of the National Minimum Wage Acts 2000 and 2015 shall be €13.50.

title: 22 of 2015)) of the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 (No. 5 of 2000), and by
heading: 3. The national minimum hourly rate of pay may include the following
text_raw:
3. The national minimum hourly rate of pay may include the following 

allowances: 

(i) 

for board only, €1.21 per hour worked 

(ii) 

for lodgings only, €31.89 per week, or €4.55 per day. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 October, 2024. 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th October, 2024.

title: 22 of 2015)) of the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 (No. 5 of 2000), and by
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

This Order sets the national minimum hourly rate of pay from 1 January 2025 at 
€13.50, and the board and lodging rates as follows: 

Lodgings: €31.89 per week, or €4.55 per day. 

Board: €1.21 per hour worked.
